name: RedBlue Adventures: Crash n' Brawl
description:
Help Redler in his quest to defeat the evil tyrant king Malculus who has kidnapped the former king, Lord Blue! On his quest he'll find new companions, fight increasingly harder enemies and have plenty of feasts!

In the main menu use the arrow keys to navigate through the menu. In the rest of the game, you pretty much use the mouse to do everything.
